The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 17 April is 41,645 (4,820.1 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 12 April, there were 157 new confirmed cases (18.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 05 April, there were 109 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 44% (48 extra cases).
